session.user:
# Quick Submit
Quickly commit all changes with a generic "update" message and submit to Graphite.
## Usage
```bash /quick-submit ```
## Implementation
Run the CLI command:
```bash erk exec quick-submit ```
## Notes
- This is a shortcut for rapid iteration - Uses generic "update" commit message - For proper commit messages, use `/erk:pr-submit` instead

tool_use.name: Bash
tool_use.param: Quick commit and submit to Graphite

session.assistant: No new changes to commit — the existing commits were submitted. PR is at https://github.com/dagster-io/erk/pull/7762.
